rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment reports action factually ('banning or limiting poultry imports') without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment discusses banning/limiting imports (financial/trade metric), which is treated as Neutral per rules.
The segment reports countries banning/limiting imports but contains no explicit calming language.
No minimiser ('only', 'just', 'merely', 'a single', 'few') combined with an explicit scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes Mexico banning/limiting imports, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment discusses trade actions (banning/limiting imports), not prices or numerical metrics.
The segment reports past consequences but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
No direct quote or clearly attributed statement providing a frame.
Factual report of consequence ('banning or limiting') following an event ('disease outbreak') without explicit framing.
